Package pddl4j

This package contains the classes relative to the pddl4j librairy.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Domain This interface defines the accessible methods from a domain.
Problem This interface defines the accessible methods from a problem.
 

Class Summary
ErrorManager This class implements the error manager used by the parser and java pddl compiler.
Parser Implements the Parser of PDD4L library.
PDDLObject This class implements a PDDL object that represente a planning domain either a planning problem.
 

Enum Summary
ErrorManager.Message This enumeration defines the type of message log in the error manager.
PDDLObject.Content This enumeration defines the content of the PDDL object.
RequireKey This enumeration defines le set of PDDL require key.
Source This enumeration is used to specify the difference version of PDDL langage.
 

Exception Summary
EvaluationException EvaluationException is thrown if an attempt is made to evaluate a function and its evaluation fails.
InvalidExpException This expression is throw when an unexpected pddl expression is detected.
ParserException This class implements a parser exception.
 

Package pddl4j Description

This package contains the classes relative to the pddl4j librairy.
